text: Antonio Giménez-Rico Sáenz de Cabezón (20 November 1938 – 12 February 2021) was a Spanish movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Burgos, Spain. His best known works were Retrato de Familia (1976), El disputado voto del Sr. Cayo (1986) and Jarrapellejos (1987). Giménez-Rico died on 12 February 2021 in Madrid, aged 82.Fallece el director burgalés Antonio Giménez Rico, premio Castilla y León de las Artes en 1996 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Spanish movie directors
title: Antonio Giménez-Rico
